Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the types of <font face="courier new">DataAdapter</font> classes against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: Links a <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> to the Microsoft Access database for retrieving and saving data.
Links a <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> to the SQL database for retrieving and saving data.
Store the SQL query results in <font face="courier new">DataTable</font> objects.
Connects to multiple databases such as Sybase and Oracle.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(OleDbDataAdapter), (B)-(SqlDataAdapter), (C)-(SqlDataAdapter), (D)-(OleDbDataAdapter), and (E)-(OleDbDataAdapter).
